title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.24 - Freeway or Expressway Ends Signs (W19 Series)
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 2C.24 - Freeway or Expressway Ends Signs (W19 Series)

State Regulations
DELETE Paragraph 04. INSERT the following paragraph: Guidance: 03A If the freeway ends, and all traffic must use an exit
ramp to leave the freeway, an ALL TRAFFIC MUST EXIT (W19-5) sign and an ALL
TRAFFIC EXIT 1 MILE (NYW9-21) sign (see Section
2C.122
) should be used in addition
to the Freeway Ends signs in advance of the downstream end of the
freeway. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
2C.24

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
